linebacker Desmond Bishop stepped into the picture and with a mighty one-handed swipe took DeSean Jackson down with a shoestring tackle at the Packers' 38-yard line.`` That was big,'' Packers defensive end Ryan Pickett said. Actually it saved the game. That's a touchdown-saving tackle. Thanks to Desmond Bishop , DeSean Jackson was stopped in his tracks after a 28-yard reception. Four plays later Eagles quarterback Michael Vick threw his fateful interception to Tramon Williams in the end zone to seal the Packers' 21-16 victory

the Internet giant. Eric Schmidt SELLS SHARES In a regulatory filing last week, Google said that Eric Schmidt in December drew up a plan to sell some of his stock in the company. The pre-arranged trading plan was adopted in order to allow Eric Schmidt to sell a portion of his Google stock as part of his long-term strategy for individual asset diversification and liquidity, the filing said. As of December 31, Eric Schmidt had about 9.2 million shares of Google stock and controlled 9.6 percent of the company's voting power. Eric Schmidt plans to sell about 534,000 shares of Class

The modalities have been worked out. A source close to the show told Mumbai Mirror, Chintuji is very excited about judging the Indian avtaar of The X Factor. He is working out the dates and soon we shall start shooting with him. After bringing Kaun Banega Crorepati back on the small screen with megastar Amitabh Bachchan last year, the channel in question launched the fourth season of the dance reality show Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa 4 with dancing diva Madhuri Dixit .
